shortDescription.text: Transitive Dependency: go.googlesource.com net#v0.10.0 from go.googlesource.com crypto#v0.18.0

fullDescription.text: go.googlesource.com net#v0.10.0 has the following vulnerabilities: [:orange_circle:] BDSA-2023-2733(CVE-2023-39325), [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2024-9807, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-1901, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2024-0942, [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2025-2490

| :yellow_circle: | [BDSA-2025-2490](https://openhub.net/vulnerabilities/bdsa/BDSA-2025-2490) | Go 'x/net/html' Module Vulnerable to Unexpected DOM Behavior via Tags with Unquoted Attributes | Yes | - |
